A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I left the cinema very disappointed and conflicted after seeing TLJ. A few days of introspection and I decided I really disliked the movie\, bordering on hating the movie. I don't hate it but I do hate Rian Johnson and Disney for this movie and what it has done to the Star Wars.

The Last Jedi will be my last new Star Wars movie that I ever watch ever again. It has ended my Star Wars saga and I refuse to acknowledge it as part of the canon along with The Force Awakens which wasn't a great movie but I enjoyed it enough to really look forward to TLJ. I will from this day forward only watch the Original Trilogy as it is the only Star Wars that matters to me.

Good work Rian / Disney\, you f##ked it all up for what? To reinvent Star Wars as a corporate SJW version that is a shell. It looks and sounds like Star Wars but it's soul has been sucked out and buried.
